mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET ATT_STR_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'), ATT_STATUS = #{attStatus } WHERE ATT_NO = (SELECT MAX(ATT_NO) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum})

UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET ATT_FIN_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'),ATT_TOTAL_TIME = (SELECT ROUND((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS'),'HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(ATT_STR_TIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'))*24,2) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE ATT_NO = (SELECT MAX(ATT_NO) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum})) WHERE ATT_NO = (SELECT MAX(ATT_NO) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM = #{memNum})
mapper.select: SELECT ATT_NO , TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATT_DATE , ATT_STR_TIME , ATT_FIN_TIME , ATT_TOTAL_TIME , ATT_STATUS , MEM_NUM FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM || TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM') LIKE #{memNum} || '%' AND ATT_NO IN(SELECT ATT_NO FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM || TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM') LIKE #{memNum} || '%' AND ATT_NO IN(SELECT MIN(ATT_NO) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM || TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM') LIKE #{memNum} || '%' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'), MEM_NUM)) ORDER BY ATT_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM || TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM') LIKE #{memNum} || '%'

SELECT ATT_STATUS , ATT_COUNT , MEM_NUM FROM ( SELECT NVL(MAX(ATT_STATUS),'지각') AS ATT_STATUS , NVL(MAX(COUNT(ATT_STATUS)),0) AS ATT_COUNT , NVL(MAX(MEM_NUM),#{memNum}) AS MEM_NUM FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM || TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM') LIKE #{memNum} || '%' AND ATT_STATUS = '지각' GROUP BY ATT_STATUS , MEM_NUM UNION SELECT NVL(MAX(ATT_STATUS),'조퇴') AS ATT_STATUS , NVL(MAX(COUNT(ATT_STATUS)),0) AS ATT_COUNT , NVL(MAX(MEM_NUM),#{memNum}) AS MEM_NUM FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM || TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM') LIKE #{memNum} || '%' AND ATT_STATUS = '조퇴' GROUP BY ATT_STATUS , MEM_NUM UNION SELECT NVL(MAX(ATT_STATUS),'출근') AS ATT_STATUS , NVL(MAX(COUNT(ATT_STATUS)),0) AS ATT_COUNT , NVL(MAX(MEM_NUM),#{memNum}) AS MEM_NUM FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE MEM_NUM || TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM') LIKE #{memNum} || '%' AND ATT_STATUS = '출근' GROUP BY ATT_STATUS , MEM_NUM ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN ATT_STATUS='지각' THEN 1 WHEN ATT_STATUS='조퇴' THEN 2 WHEN ATT_STATUS='출근' THEN 3 END
SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND MEM_NUM = #{memberNum}

SELECT MEMBER_NAME , DIV_NAME , TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATT_DATE , ATT_STR_TIME , ATT_FIN_TIME , ATT_TOTAL_TIME , ATT_STATUS , MEM_NUM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{inVar} AND ATT_STATUS = '지각' ) AS lateNum , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{inVar} AND ATT_STATUS = '출근') AS attNum , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{inVar} AND ATT_STATUS = '결근') AS absNum FROM ATTENDANCE JOIN MEMBER ON MEM_NUM = MEMBER_NUM JOIN DIVISION ON DIV_CODE = DIVISION WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{inVar} ORDER BY ATT_NO

SELECT MEMBER_NAME , DIV_NAME , TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATT_DATE , ATT_STR_TIME , ATT_FIN_TIME , ATT_TOTAL_TIME , ATT_STATUS , MEM_NUM FROM ATTENDANCE JOIN MEMBER ON MEM_NUM = MEMBER_NUM JOIN DIVISION ON DIV_CODE = DIVISION WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{type}
AND MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND DIV_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND (MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' OR DIV_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%')
ORDER BY ATT_NO

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{inVar} AND ATT_STATUS = '지각' ) AS lateNum , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{inVar} AND ATT_STATUS = '출근') AS attNum , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE TO_CHAR(ATT_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') = #{inVar} AND ATT_STATUS = '결근') AS absNum FROM DUAL
